text: This place needs an overhaul. I went in, I was not greeted. The next customer who came in, was greeted. The 2 women in front of me were tended to pretty quickly. It took at least 5 minutes before someone attempted to take my order. Another …More

text: Good place to grab a pizza and drink.  Staff was very friendly, and food was tasty.  I highly recommend the blood orange lemonade!

text: Cash not accepted. No bills higher then 20 even if your total is more then 50 and you have a 50 dollar bill... Pizza is good long line got to me quickly..

text: I have build your own. Pretty much veggie with spicy red sauce. And I always mix the blood orange lemonade with sprite.

name: Gabriela Diaz
text: Delicious place for a "build your own" pizza experience. They have a menu with specialty pizzas but I always choose to build my own. Flat rate for as many toppings as you want. They have different types of dough to choose from and tons of …More

name: Karol Para
text: Very good experience! Amazing food and such kind service. Great place to stop by and grab a bite to eat. I would say it’s a Chipotle Kind of place, as though you see how they prepare your food, and chose what you get on your pizza. Most definitely will come back here, and I totally will recommend it to many friends!

name: Daisy Chaidez
text: Everyone was super nice here. It was my first time there and they helped me through everystep. Will be coming back!!

name: K Wojo
text: Blaze Pizza and Mod Pizza are competing for the quick pizza eating system. Both are good. I like Mod Pizza a little better, but Blaze is up there too. One cost pizza with whatever toppings you want is awesome. Friendly staff, good atmosphere. Great selection.

name: justwess2
text: I've never been to Blaze before. The staff was courteous and kind and explained the whole Blaze experience to me! The pizza was very good. I even had leftovers. And the restaurant was clean and neat. I would take my friends here! It was very nice

name: Hope Stevenson
text: Great pizza! My favorite is the Art Lover & orders take only 5 minutes!!

name: Lily Jaronczyk
text: Very good pizza! Build your own pizza is the best option on the menu in my opinion. Don't see many pizza shops where they style the pizza the way you want it right in front of you. No long wait, and great service!

name: Glass Half-full
text: They have vegan cheese... but who needs it when you can build your own pizza with the variety of toppings they offer, including brussel sprouts!

text: Worst experience ever, Blaze do not deserve any stars at all. Food line look like no one cleaned it for today. No regard for cross  Contamination. If you do not eat meat don't eat there. They touch the meat and veggies with the same gloves. Uncleanliness best way describe this place.. No diversity at all.

name: Rosanne Beltz
text: Service great. Helpful and nice folks. It's the pizza that just plain sucks. Was hoping it wouldn't because they have so many unique varieties.

text: Place was tasty! I enjoyed the diverse ingredients & freedom to create your own pizza! I also like how fast my pizza was done. I got ranch on the side , sooo good 😀

text: Joe was informative and helped us build our first pizza, and was really nice and polite. The pizza itself was freshly made in front of our eyes I loved it

name: Ali Dinero
text: I love blaze pizza. This place is terrible tho. Guy who made my pizza had no idea what he was doing and piled up black olives with the water on one side. Also that guy looked liked he needed a shower. Unclean, i was disgusted. Never coming back.

name: nauvilus Cook
text: I really like blaze pizza, they have fresh toppings with a lot of options. They pizzas aren't greasy which is a plus for us health conscious people.

name: Claire Barker
text: Every time I go here it’s great! I love the employees! There is a man upfront who is ALWAYS Very friendly! And many more who are!  Employees like this are hard to come by! Keep it up! I leave happy every time I come here!!!

name: jules delpercio
text: If you're vegan you're going to want to come to this Blaze Pizza in Orland Park instead of the Blaze in Tinley. You still have to remind them but they have separate utensils out for vegan pizza.

name: Shmexyzombie
text: Whenever I come here the staff welcomes me in the door, and the pizza itself is great. Ordering beforehand cuts the wait time, but I don't mind hanging out in here with the atmosphere [And smells!] of the establishment. Would recommend if you're craving a person pizza made to your liking!

name: James Stolte
text: Really great pizza. Build your own! I never have to compromise. Also the crust is awesome.
